pageProduct.name: Olay Regenerist Revitalising Lotion 15+ 75mL
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Olay Regenerist Revitalising UV Lotion SPF15 Advanced Anti-Ageing Face Cream Moisturiser reduces lines & wrinkles. Look up to 10 years younger in just 28 days!

Lightweight SPF 15. Anti-ageing lotion.

1. Exfoliates & smoothes.

2. Visibly reduces lines & wrinkles.

Technology:

Formula with Amino-peptide Complex helps renew skin’s surface layers. 

Find out more at Olay.com.au.

Broad spectrum SPF 15.

Size: 75mL

SPF: 15

KEY FEATURES

• Formula helps to: Renew skin's youthful look. Reduce fine line and wrinkle appearance with moisturisation. Protect skin from UV rays. Exfoliate and smooth skin.
• Product Attributes: Lightweight. Easily absorbed. Non-greasy.

Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse well with water. If skin irritation develops, discontinue use. Important information, do not discard outer carton.

Ingredients

Water, Glycerin, Niacinamide, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Dimethicone, Isopropyl Isostearate, Octocrylene, Panthenol, Phenylbenzimidazole Sulfonic Acid, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Triethanolamine, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Benzyl Alcohol, Isohexadecane, PTFE, Tocopheryl Acetate, Titanium Dioxide, Behenyl Alcohol, Stearyl Alcohol, Cetyl Alcohol, Dimethiconol, Methylparaben, Allantoin, Carbomer, Ethylparaben, Fragrance, Propylparaben, PEG-100 Stearate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetearyl Glucoside, Polysorbate 60, Disodium EDTA, Sodium PEG-7 Olive Oil Carboxylate, BHT, Palmitic Acid, Stearic Acid, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Palmitoyl Pentapeptide-4.

Directions

Using your fingertips, smooth evenly onto clean skin over face and neck, once or twice a day. Use alone or before applying foundation make-up.

USAGE ADVICE

Choose from among the following regimen steps from Regenerist:
1. Cleanser: Designed to gently remove dirt and make-up leaving skin purified and prepared for the rest of your routine.
2. Serum: Designed to be lightweight so they can be layered on the skin before your traditional moisturiser. Easily absorbs and delivers anti-aging ingredients into skin's epidermis layer.
3. Moisturiser: Designed for long-lasting hydration and offered in 3 types - Day, UV, and Night.
4. Eye/Treatment: Eye: Use after your moisturiser to hydrate the eye area and address key eye concerns.
Treatment: Specially designed with advanced ingredients/technology to treat specific skin concerns. Add these to further customise your skincare regimen.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
